thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall, Who’s the Fairest City of Them All?

author: Mara Gay
title: Mirror, Mirror on the Wall, Who’s the Fairest City of Them All?
text:
Mayor Bill de Blasio is kicking off his second term with a new favorite superlative, a promise to make New York City the “fairest big city in America.”
The goal is as lofty as it is ill-defined, and the mayor has offered a 12-point plan to accomplish it. His list mostly includes his longstanding policies, like building affordable housing and taxing millionaires to fix the subways.
At... RELATED VIDEO Mayor de Blasio's 'Historic,' 'Transcendent' City New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio has used the words “historic” and “transcendent” many times in his first nine months in office. WSJ’s Mara Gay reports
